resources.string: Current document is protected, Please enter a Permission Password.
Are you sure you want to remove security from this document?
-When \"Open Document\" is turned on, a password is required to open the document.
-When \"Document Restrictions\" is enabled, a password is needed to remove the protection, and you can choose to disallow certain features for this document.
The Document Open and Owner passwords cannot be the same, please enter a different password in either the Document Open Password field or the Owner Password field.
After applying encryption, the encryption and all other changes to the file will be saved.
After applying decryption, the decryption and all other changes to the file will be saved.
Are you sure you want to delete this certificate?\n You will no longer be able to verify the identity of the owner if you do

If you change the trusted settings, you will need to revalidate any signatures to see the changes. Trusting certificates directly from a document is not recommended. Are you sure you want to continue?
